description: Number of partitions of n into parts 8k+5 or 8k+7.
formula: a(n) ~ exp(Pi*sqrt(n/6)) * Gamma(5/8) * Gamma(7/8) / (4 * sqrt(3*Pi) * n). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 27 2015
mathematica: nmax = 100; Rest[CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/((1 - x^(8k+5))*(1 - x^(8k+7))), {k, 0, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 27 2015 *)
